Slop_Spectral.lean.note: Heavy axiomatization due to missing spectral theory in mathlib

reasoning.why_axioms: Mathlib4 lacks comprehensive spectral graph theory. Axioms capture key spectral properties (eigenvalues, Cheeger inequality, mixing lemma) and explicit constructions (Ramanujan graphs, zig-zag product) that are foundational but not yet formalized.
reasoning.decomposition_strategy: Split into three orthogonal concerns: (1) combinatorial expansion properties (computable, concrete), (2) spectral characterization (requires linear algebra, axiomatized), (3) explicit families (existence results, axiomatized)
reasoning.inhuman_lean_compliance: All lemmas follow style guide: â‰¤7.5 tactic budget, explicit type class binders, one-line docstrings, no 'where' clauses, redundancy encouraged

next_steps.immediate: Test automated proof completion on lemmas with 'sorry'
next_steps.short_term: Prove or axiomatize Unit01 dependencies that Spectral.lean needs
next_steps.long_term: Replace axioms with actual proofs by extending mathlib's spectral theory
